general.gigTitle: develop professional wordpress website using a custom theme

sellerCard.oneLiner: You have the vision and I have the skills to build it
sellerCard.description:
Hi there!

I’m Tahir and I have more than 8 years of practical experience with WordPress and Shopify, especially custom theme development, hosting and website migration, email configuration, and SMTP setup. Over the years, I’ve built many sites using custom themes and page builders in WordPress, and I have also helped businesses in migrating their Shopify 1.0 stores to 2.0 and make reusable sections and templates to streamline future updates.

If you need help with your website, feel free to reach out!

description.content:
Hi there! I'm Sam, a Full-Time Freelancer Since 2016


Are you looking for an expert in custom WordPress theme developer, Youre in the right place!


With 8+ years of experience, I have built 500+ eCommerce and business websites. I specialize in custom WordPress theme and plugin development to create fast, secure, and lightweight websites.


Why Choose a Custom WordPress Theme?

- No third-party API calls better security & performance

- No speed issues optimized for fast loading

- No extra JS & CSS clean & lightweight

- Fully secure & stable


I develop Custom Theme using:

️- Advanced Custom Fields (ACF) most popular & flexible

- JetEngine Crocoblock powerful & dynamic

️- Custom Post Types (CPT) structured content management


Guaranteed Services Youll Get:

️- 100% Satisfaction I dont stop until youre happy

️-️ 15 Days of Free Support after project completion

️️- Unlimited Revisions no extra charges

️️- Fast Response (within 1 hour!)

️️- Money-Back Guarantee if the design doesnt match your Figma file

️️- Basic Website Management Help


Let's Build Something Amazing Together!


Why wait? Click the Order Button Now and work with a WordPress Pro!


Best,

Sam

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I be able to edit my website easily?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: yes! You can easily edit your website content (text + images) on all the pages of your website by drag-drop options.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What are the key requirements for the development of the WordPress website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The most basic and compulsory requirements are: 1. WordPress friendly hosting  2. A domain name/website name (e.g. www.example.com) linked with hosting server. 3. Content for pages (text+images). 4. Logo

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide hosting/domain name registration services?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes I can but it would be extra charges for these.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I have your Facebook/Email/Skype details so that we can communicate easily?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I am sorry, but that is totally against the TOS of Fiverr. All communication must be done via text through the Fiverr messaging system. All payments are also to be done through Fiverr.

packageList.title: All in one

and two custom templates/pages + mobile responsivness

milestones.title: Video meetup
milestones.description: We'll meet (Zoom) to discuss your project.

steps.title: Specifications
steps.description: I'll write the specifications for your site's functionality and features.

steps.title: Requirements
steps.description: We'll make sure I have everything needed to complete your project.

steps.title: Onboarding Questionnaire
steps.description: You'll fill out a detailed questionnaire / brief.

milestones.title: Research
milestones.description: I’ll do research based on your needs.

steps.title: Planning
steps.description: I'll use your provided requirements to start planning your website.

steps.title: Website Design
steps.description: I'll create the design for your website.

milestones.title: Development
milestones.description: I'll develop the website and deliver a working product for your review.

milestones.title: First draft
milestones.description: I'll prepare a first draft of the delivery.

steps.title: Modifications
steps.description: I'll modify assets based on your feedback.

steps.title: Content Upload
steps.description: I'll upload your content (copy, images, videos, etc.) to your website.

milestones.title: Delivery
milestones.description: I'll send you the final delivery for review and feedback.

reviews.comment: Working with Samama Tahir was a wonderful experience! The professionalism and attention to detail truly exceeded my expectations, and the timely delivery enhanced my project effortlessly. His politeness and fluency in language made our collaboration smooth and enjoyable. HIGHLY recommended! 👍

Sam T. did an outstanding job on our website development project, EXCEEDING expectations with flawless delivery and thorough documentation. Working with Sam was a breeze – quick responses, proactive communication, and timely delivery. 👍 Highly recommend!

Sam T. did an EXCEPTIONAL job on our website development project! Bug-free and exceeding expectations, his professionalism truly shines. Working with Sam was seamless; his language fluency and cooperative spirit made the project smooth and enjoyable. Highly recommend! 👍

seller_response.comment: Thanks man! Always happy to help 🙂

reviews.comment: Sam T. was highly responsive and cooperative throughout the project, making collaboration smooth and efficient.
